headline: Allstate Dividend Hike And Earnings Spark Fresh Focus On Shareholder Returns
summary: Allstate (NYSE:ALL) announced an increase in its quarterly dividend alongside its latest fourth quarter and full year earnings release. The company paired the dividend move with strong reported results, underscoring its focus on returning cash to shareholders. The update comes with Allstate’s share price at $199.94. For investors watching NYSE:ALL, the combination of a higher dividend and solid earnings puts fresh attention on a stock that has returned 9.3% over the past year, 57.1% over...
